title: Supercreep v0.04 (Lawina) [F95]
description:
About This Game

The story takes places in the 21st century, where you, as the protagonist, live a life not worth living. With no friends, no job, a huge debt and to top it all of, still a virgin, you are at the verge of giving up. However, after an unexpected turn of events, you wake up with superpowers.

What will you do with these superpowers? Will you use it to fulfill your sexual fantasies, become an evil villain or an honored superhero


Changelog:

New additions:

- added a new town called Pleasantville (pier, factory, mega mall, condo, massage parlor)

- added 'forest path' connecting Sad Valley and Pleasantville

- added new Area 69 interiors (Building D & E)

- added jail (police station)

- added new parody character: Emma Wantsome (introductory)

- added new follower: Doll

- added new character: Mechanic Ika

- added random event in library

- added option to take a nap in your bed to recover (available after Chapter 1 begins)

- added (home) basement upgrade option (only lights atm)

- added a blue marker/indicator on top of characters or items that starts an optional(!) side quest (buggy)

- added a new map + legend for Pleasantville, that can be accessed from the phone

- added 2 animated scenes to the 'club boss' quest (first attempt at 3d animations)

- added 8 new memories (scenes), which can be accessed from your phone

- added quest #31: Blind Date no. 2 (Zippie Mall 1F)

- added quest #32: Blind Date no. 3 (Pier)

- added quest #33: Cleaning Pleasant Park (Pleasantville)

- added quest #34: Drugtrading (Police Station)

- added quest #35: Drugbusting (Police Station)

- added quest #36: The New Age (Pleasantville)

- added quest #37: Club Boss (Sad Valley)

- added quest #38: The Wiz (Pier)

- added quest #39: Dolly, where art thou? (Pleasantville)

- added quest #40: Electronics for Dummies (Pleasantville)

- added quest #41: Literal Daddy (Pleasantville / unfinished!)

- added quest #42: Victoria's Clitoris (Pleasantville)

Fixes/adjustments:

- changed quest #23: Taken (it can now be completed)

- changed quest #25: Deeper into Area 69 (objective #3 and #4 can now be completed - objective #5 still unavailable)

- changed quest #29: The Nun is Gun (it can now be completed)

- changed train movement/event (HUGE performance boost)

- changed passage of tilets to minimize event usage for passages (performance boost)

- changed the color of "morality" when giving Sophia a drink without sedative (previously red)

- changed event settings for "Missing Itchy Pussy" quest (repeatable quest but marked as "Complete")

- fixed selection issue with Betty at the Hospital (right-click leaded to buying medication)

- changed event settings for "Lucy Needs Money" quest (repeatable quest but marked as "Complete")

- fixed Area 69 Building A Terminal (does not erase image when cancelled via right-click)

- fixed issue with Grift3r/'Boobs on the Beach' quest, where guard wouldn't step aside

- fixed showing an incorrect message when trying to enter the school

- fixed box disappearing in the basement

- fixed issues at Gym / first encounter with Christina (message popup position & message flow)

- fixed issue when accessing the 'Terminals' in Area69 which would reset certain missions

- changed annoyance with Area 69 passcodes requiring to memorize them (now passcode appears on Quest Log)

- fixed Area 69 doors requiring passcode with each interaction (too frustrating to remember them)

- changed blackjack at the casino, where there is now a money restriction (soft money limit to improve balance)

- changed the library book purchase method (no longer able to purchase from the merchant, but from the shelves - when available)

- fixed the changing rooms in the gym. You can now only take a peek before Chapter 2 begins.

- changed/optimized all PNG images. This saved about 100 MB in size, while the quality of the images have not (visibly) reduced.

- fixed issue with 'Lucy's Pussy' quest not completing when certain criteria was met.


Instructions:

1- Extract to desired location.
2- Click on Game.exe to start playing
